name: Pockets
description:
Pockets

Fit everything into the pockets perfectly. Each level is a different moment in time. 

4 levels with a 5th on the way!

Controls

WASD - move

Spacebar - pickup/drop

Q/E - rotate

C - clear board and reset.

Credits

Music: 0450am by airtone (c) copyright 2022 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/airtone/65028

Sound Effects: Some of the sounds in this project were created by ViRiX Dreamcore (David McKee) soundcloud.com/virix

Click sound effects:

https://opengameart.org/content/click
https://opengameart.org/content/menu-selection-click
